name: Be Not Afraid, But Run
description:
POLLUTED WITH OUR BETTER ANGELS
THE WAYS BEAR HAZARDS
FEW DARE CHALLENGE

GO, O MESSENGER
AND HEED THESE WORDS:

BE NOT AFRAID
BUT RUN

Endless Running and Gunning. An infinity of angels stand before you and your goal. The way should have been abandoned long hence; it is too late now. You are never going to make it. How long can you survive? Compete on online leaderboards. Experience the legend of the Endless Runner.
